title: The Wardrobe
description: Over one hundred years ago in England, a family legacy was born. A young woman cast an ancient spell, binding a dark evil toa ring of oak trees. She thought her family was safe. Then, clovenfootprints appeared in the snow across the countryside leading towardrobes carved from the tainted oak. For generations, a family wasterrorized. Armed only with a collection of books passed down tofemale ancestors, Briana Ackerley is left to face her destiny anddestroy an evil older than time. To protect the ones she loves, shemust face the truth of what hides in... the wardrobe.
author: Susan Elliston
